publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-957 Brian Adam: Big Screens for International Games—That the Parliament encourages local authorities, in collaboration with the Scottish Football Association and local organisations such as football clubs, to facilitate the broadcasting of Scotland’s international football matches on large video screens in central locations when terrestrial broadcast is not available, using ready-made stadia as possible venues, thus enabling a broader range of people to have the chance to show their support for the national side.
S3M-957 Big Screens for International Games (lodged on 3 December 2007) Jamie Hepburn*, Mike Pringle*, Sandra White*
